Desc.entry: Buggyfit classes are an hour long and usually involve an approximately 3 mile route in total. Classes start with a moderate warm up walk, moving to a power walk or run to raise heart rates. Each class includes group exercises specifically selected to strengthen and tone particular muscle groups and enable people to cope with the demands of motherhood. Included in the sessions are tips and techniques on adopting and maintaining better posture and the chance to chat and make new friends. All classes have been developed by experts to suit the various stages after having a baby. Trainers are experts in assessing how hard to work each Mum and will always ensure safe technique is used to gain maximum results.
